bewertungCard.title: Evaluation
bewertungCard.sicherheitTooltipText1: This value is derived from the average safety of all assets in the portfolio. The information is based on the position in the graph.
bewertungCard.sicherheitTooltipText2: Assets that are not included in the graph are not considered.
bewertungCard.potentialTooltipText1: This value is derived from the average potential of all assets in the portfolio. The information is based on the position in the graph. The purchase price is taken into account in the calculation, as the potential is based on the respective low of the last 12 months.
bewertungCard.potentialTooltipText2: Assets that are not included in the graph are not considered.

dash.aboutContent: Here is some information about me. English is my primary language.
dash.trustedByThousandsDesc: Join a community of satisfied clients who have entrusted us with their real estate needs, backed by our track record of excellence.
dash.wideRangeofPropertiesDesc: Discover your perfect fit from a diverse selection of properties, tailored to meet every preference and lifestyle.
dash.financingMadeEasyDesc: Simplify your real estate journey with hassle-free financing solutions designed to empower your property ambitions.
dash.lockedInPricingDesc: Secure your investment and peace of mind with locked-in pricing, safeguarding you from market fluctuations.
dash.evaluatePropertyDesc: Make informed real estate decisions by accurately assessing property value and potential through expert property evaluation.
dash.meetYourAgentDesc: Find your dedicated real estate expert to guide you through seamless property transactions and personalized solutions.
dash.closeTheDealDesc: Seal the deal confidently with our professional support, ensuring successful and smooth real estate transactions.
dash.haveYourPropertyDesc: Turn your real estate aspirations into reality by owning your dream property with our expert assistance.
dash.Bottom der Coins Bärenmarkt nach 2021 vi: Bottom of Coins Bear Market After 2021 Visualized
